attributes.action: cease the annual punitive taxation of private pension funds.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This tax was introduced by Gordon Brown in 1997, & is thought to be the main cause of the £75bn shortfall in the pension schemes of the top 100 British companies.  Many are now so under funded that millions of workers are facing the prospect of having to work for longer than expected to get a decent pension.
